00036 const simsignalwrap_t BaseMobility::mobilityStateChangedSignal = simsignalwrap_t(MIXIM_SIGNAL_MOBILITY_CHANGE_NAME);

00038 template<typename _Tp>
00039 static inline bool isFiniteNumber(register _Tp value) {
00040     return value < std::numeric_limits<_Tp>::infinity() && value > -std::numeric_limits<_Tp>::infinity() && value != std::numeric_limits<_Tp>::quiet_NaN();
00041 }

00043 BaseMobility::BaseMobility()
00044   : BatteryAccess()
00045   , world(NULL)
00046   , move()
00047   , constraintAreaMin(Coord::ZERO)
00048   , constraintAreaMax(Coord::ZERO)
00049   , updateInterval(0)
00050   , moveMsg(NULL)
00051   , coreDebug(false)
00052   , scaleNodeByDepth(false)
00053   , playgroundScaleX(1)
00054   , playgroundScaleY(1)
00055   , origDisplayWidth(0)
00056   , origDisplayHeight(0)
00057   , origIconSize(0)
00058 {}
00059 
00060 BaseMobility::BaseMobility(unsigned stacksize)
00061   : BatteryAccess(stacksize)
00062   , world(NULL)
00063   , move()
00064   , constraintAreaMin()
00065   , constraintAreaMax()
00066   , updateInterval(0)
00067   , moveMsg(NULL)
00068   , coreDebug(false)
00069   , scaleNodeByDepth(false)
00070   , playgroundScaleX(1)
00071   , playgroundScaleY(1)
00072   , origDisplayWidth(0)
00073   , origDisplayHeight(0)
00074   , origIconSize(0)
00075 {}

00077 void BaseMobility::initialize(int stage)
00078 {
00079     BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00080     if (stage == 0){
00081         hasPar("coreDebug") ? coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue() : coreDebug = false;
00082 
00083         coreEV << "initializing BaseMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00084 
00085         hasPar("scaleNodeByDepth") ? scaleNodeByDepth
00086             = par("scaleNodeByDepth").boolValue()
00087             : scaleNodeByDepth = true;
00088 
00089         // get utility pointers (world and host)
00090     world = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>::findGlobalModule();
00091         if (world == NULL)
00092             error("Could not find BaseWorldUtility module");
00093 
00094         coreEV << "initializing BaseUtility stage " << stage << endl; // for node position
00095 
00096         const bool use2D = world->use2D();
00097 
00098         if (hasPar("updateInterval")) {
00099           updateInterval = par("updateInterval");
00100         } else {
00101             updateInterval = 0;
00102         }
00103 
00104         if (hasPar("constraintAreaMinX") && hasPar("constraintAreaMinY") && hasPar("constraintAreaMinZ")) {
00105           double x = par("constraintAreaMinX");
00106           double y = par("constraintAreaMinY");
00107           double z = par("constraintAreaMinZ");
00108 
00109       if (isFiniteNumber(x))
00110         constraintAreaMin.x = x;
00111       if (isFiniteNumber(y))
00112         constraintAreaMin.y = y;
00113       if (!use2D && isFiniteNumber(z))
00114         constraintAreaMin.z = z;
00115         }
00116       constraintAreaMin = constraintAreaMin.max(Coord::ZERO);
00117         constraintAreaMax = *world->getPgs();
00118         if (hasPar("constraintAreaMaxX") && hasPar("constraintAreaMaxY") && hasPar("constraintAreaMaxZ")) {
00119           double x = par("constraintAreaMaxX");
00120           double y = par("constraintAreaMaxY");
00121           double z = par("constraintAreaMaxZ");
00122 
00123       if (isFiniteNumber(x) && x < constraintAreaMax.x)
00124         constraintAreaMax.x = x;
00125       if (isFiniteNumber(y) && y < constraintAreaMax.y)
00126         constraintAreaMax.y = y;
00127       if (!use2D && isFiniteNumber(z) && z < constraintAreaMax.z)
00128         constraintAreaMax.z = z;
00129         }
00130 
00131         //initalize position with random values
00132         Coord pos = Coord::ZERO;
00133 
00134         if (hasPar("initFromDisplayString") && par("initFromDisplayString").boolValue() && findHost()) {
00135           const cDisplayString& sDisp = findHost()->getDisplayString();
00136 
00137       std::istringstream(sDisp.getTagArg("p", 0)) >> pos.x;
00138       std::istringstream(sDisp.getTagArg("p", 1)) >> pos.y;
00139         }
00140         else {
00141       //read coordinates from parameters if available
00142       double x = hasPar("x") ? par("x").doubleValue() : par("initialX").doubleValue();
00143       double y = hasPar("y") ? par("y").doubleValue() : par("initialY").doubleValue();
00144       double z = hasPar("z") ? par("z").doubleValue() : par("initialZ").doubleValue();
00145 
00146       pos = getRandomPosition();
00147 
00148       //set position with values from parameters if available
00149       if (isFiniteNumber(x))
00150         pos.x = x;
00151       if (isFiniteNumber(y))
00152         pos.y = y;
00153       if (!use2D && isFiniteNumber(z))
00154         pos.z = z;
00155         }
00156         // set start-position and start-time (i.e. current simulation-time) of the Move
00157         move.setStart(pos);
00158     coreEV << "start pos: " << move.getStartPos().info() << endl;
00159 
00160         // set speed and direction of the Move
00161         move.setSpeed(0);
00162         move.setDirectionByVector(Coord::ZERO);
00163     }
00164     else if (stage == 1){
00165         coreEV << "initializing BaseMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00166 
00167         //get playground scaling
00168         if (world->getParentModule() != NULL )
00169         {
00170           const cDisplayString& dispWorldOwner
00171           = world->getParentModule()->getDisplayString();
00172 
00173           if( dispWorldOwner.containsTag("bgb") )
00174       {
00175             double origPGWidth = 0.0;
00176             double origPGHeight= 0.0;
00177             // normally this should be equal to playground size
00178         std::istringstream(dispWorldOwner.getTagArg("bgb", 0))
00179             >> origPGWidth;
00180         std::istringstream(dispWorldOwner.getTagArg("bgb", 1))
00181             >> origPGHeight;
00182 
00183         //bgb of zero means size isn't set manually
00184         if(origPGWidth > 0) {
00185           playgroundScaleX = origPGWidth / playgroundSizeX();
00186         }
00187         if(origPGHeight > 0) {
00188           playgroundScaleY = origPGHeight / playgroundSizeY();
00189         }
00190       }
00191         }
00192 
00193         //get original display of host
00194     cDisplayString& disp = findHost()->getDisplayString();
00195 
00196         //get host width and height
00197     if (disp.containsTag("b")) {
00198       std::istringstream(disp.getTagArg("b", 0)) >> origDisplayWidth;
00199       std::istringstream(disp.getTagArg("b", 1)) >> origDisplayHeight;
00200     }
00201     //get hosts icon size
00202     if (disp.containsTag("i")) {
00203       // choose a appropriate icon size (only if a icon is specified)
00204       origIconSize = iconSizeTagToSize(disp.getTagArg("is", 0));
00205     }
00206 
00207         if (!isFiniteNumber(move.getStartPos().x) || !isFiniteNumber(move.getStartPos().y) || !isFiniteNumber(move.getStartPos().z))
00208             throw cRuntimeError("mobility position is not a finite number after initialize %s",
00209                   move.getStartPos().info().c_str());
00210         if (!move.getStartPos().isInBoundary(constraintAreaMin, constraintAreaMax))
00211             throw cRuntimeError("mobility position %s is outside the constraint area (%s - %s)",
00212                   move.getStartPos().info().c_str(),
00213                   constraintAreaMin.info().c_str(),
00214                   constraintAreaMax.info().c_str());
00215 
00216         // print new host position on the screen and update bb info
00217         updatePosition();
00218 
00219         if (move.getSpeed() > 0 && updateInterval > 0)
00220         {
00221           coreEV << "Host is moving, speed=" << move.getSpeed() << " updateInterval=" << updateInterval << endl;
00222           moveMsg = new cMessage("move", MOVE_HOST);
00223           //host moves the first time after some random delay to avoid synchronized movements
00224             scheduleAt(simTime() + uniform(0, updateInterval), moveMsg);
00225         }
00226     }
00227 }
00228 
00229 int BaseMobility::iconSizeTagToSize(const char* tag)
00230 {
00231   if(strcmp(tag, "vs") == 0) {
00232     return 16;
00233   } else if(strcmp(tag, "s") == 0) {
00234     return 24;
00235   } else if(strcmp(tag, "n") == 0 || strcmp(tag, "") == 0) {
00236     return 40;
00237   } else if(strcmp(tag, "l") == 0) {
00238     return 60;
00239   } else if(strcmp(tag, "vl") == 0) {
00240     return 100;
00241   }
00242 
00243   return -1;
00244 }
00245 
00246 const char* BaseMobility::iconSizeToTag(double size)
00247 {
00248   //returns the biggest icon smaller than the passed size (except sizes
00249   //smaller than the smallest icon
00250   if(size < 24) {
00251     return "vs";
00252   } else if(size < 40) {
00253     return "s";
00254   } else if(size < 60) {
00255     return "n";
00256   } else if(size < 100) {
00257     return "l";
00258   } else {
00259     return "vl";
00260   }
00261 }
00262 
00263 void BaseMobility::handleMessage(cMessage * msg)
00264 {
00265     if (!msg->isSelfMessage())
00266         error("mobility modules can only receive self messages");
00267 
00268     if(msg->getKind() == MOVE_TO_BORDER){
00269       handleBorderMsg(msg);
00270     } else {
00271       handleSelfMsg(msg);
00272     }
00273 }
00274 
00275 
00276 
00277 void BaseMobility::handleSelfMsg(cMessage * msg)
00278 {
00279     makeMove();
00280     updatePosition();
00281 
00282     if( !moveMsg->isScheduled() && move.getSpeed() > 0) {
00283       scheduleAt(simTime() + updateInterval, msg);
00284     } else {
00285       delete msg;
00286       moveMsg = NULL;
00287     }
00288 }
00289 
00290 
00291 
00292 void BaseMobility::handleBorderMsg(cMessage * msg)
00293 {
00294     coreEV << "start MOVE_TO_BORDER:" << move.info() << endl;
00295 
00296     BorderMsg* bMsg = static_cast<BorderMsg*>(msg);
00297 
00298     switch( bMsg->getPolicy() ){
00299     case REFLECT:
00300     move.setStart(bMsg->getStartPos());
00301     move.setDirectionByVector(bMsg->getDirection());
00302     break;
00303 
00304     case WRAP:
00305     move.setStart(bMsg->getStartPos());
00306     break;
00307 
00308     case PLACERANDOMLY:
00309     move.setStart(bMsg->getStartPos());
00310     coreEV << "new random position: " << move.getStartPos().info() << endl;
00311     break;
00312 
00313     case RAISEERROR:
00314     error("node moved outside the playground");
00315     break;
00316 
00317     default:
00318       error("Unknown BorderPolicy!");
00319       break;
00320     }
00321 
00322     fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00323 
00324     updatePosition();
00325 
00326     delete bMsg;
00327 
00328     coreEV << "end MOVE_TO_BORDER:" << move.info() << endl;
00329 }
00330 
00331 
00332 
00333 void BaseMobility::updatePosition() {
00334     coreEV << "updatePosition: " << move.info() << endl;
00335 
00336     //publish the the new move
00337     emit(mobilityStateChangedSignal, this);
00338 
00339     if(ev.isGUI())
00340     {
00341       std::ostringstream osDisplayTag;
00342 #ifdef __APPLE__
00343       const int          iPrecis        = 0;
00344 #else
00345       const int          iPrecis        = 5;
00346 #endif
00347       cDisplayString&    disp           = findHost()->getDisplayString();
00348 
00349       // setup output stream
00350       osDisplayTag << std::fixed; osDisplayTag.precision(iPrecis);
00351 
00352       if (playgroundScaleX != 1.0) {
00353         osDisplayTag << (move.getStartPos().x * playgroundScaleX);
00354       }
00355       else {
00356         osDisplayTag << (move.getStartPos().x);
00357       }
00358         disp.setTagArg("p", 0, osDisplayTag.str().data());
00359 
00360       osDisplayTag.str(""); // reset
00361       if (playgroundScaleY != 1.0) {
00362         osDisplayTag << (move.getStartPos().y * playgroundScaleY);
00363       }
00364       else {
00365         osDisplayTag << (move.getStartPos().y);
00366       }
00367         disp.setTagArg("p", 1, osDisplayTag.str().data());
00368 
00369       if(!world->use2D() && scaleNodeByDepth)
00370       {
00371         const double minScale = 0.25;
00372         const double maxScale = 1.0;
00373 
00374         //scale host dependent on their z coordinate to simulate a depth
00375         //effect
00376       //z-coordinate of zero maps to a scale of maxScale (very close)
00377       //z-coordinate of playground size z maps to size of minScale (far away)
00378         double depthScale = minScale
00379                           + (maxScale - minScale)
00380                             * (1.0 - move.getStartPos().z
00381                                      / playgroundSizeZ());
00382 
00383         if (origDisplayWidth > 0.0 && origDisplayHeight > 0.0) {
00384             osDisplayTag.str(""); // reset
00385         osDisplayTag << (origDisplayWidth * depthScale);
00386             disp.setTagArg("b", 0, osDisplayTag.str().data());
00387 
00388             osDisplayTag.str(""); // reset
00389         osDisplayTag << (origDisplayHeight * depthScale);
00390             disp.setTagArg("b", 1, osDisplayTag.str().data());
00391           }
00392 
00393         if (origIconSize > 0) {
00394           // choose a appropriate icon size (only if a icon is specified)
00395         disp.setTagArg("is", 0,
00396                        iconSizeToTag(origIconSize * depthScale));
00397         }
00398       }
00399     }
00400 }
00401 
00402 
00403 void BaseMobility::reflectCoordinate(BorderHandling border, Coord& c)
00404 {
00405     switch( border ) {
00406     case X_SMALLER:
00407         c.x = (-c.x);
00408       break;
00409     case X_BIGGER:
00410         c.x = (2 * playgroundSizeX() - c.x);
00411       break;
00412 
00413     case Y_SMALLER:
00414         c.y = (-c.y);
00415       break;
00416     case Y_BIGGER:
00417         c.y = (2 * playgroundSizeY() - c.y);
00418         break;
00419 
00420     case Z_SMALLER:
00421         c.z = (-c.z);
00422         break;
00423     case Z_BIGGER:
00424         c.z = (2 * playgroundSizeZ() - c.z);
00425       break;
00426 
00427     case NOWHERE:
00428     default:
00429       error("wrong border handling case!");
00430       break;
00431     }
00432 }
00433 
00434 
00435 void BaseMobility::reflectIfOutside(BorderHandling wo, Coord& stepTarget,
00436                   Coord& targetPos, Coord& step,
00437                   double& angle) {
00438 
00439     reflectCoordinate(wo, targetPos);
00440     reflectCoordinate(wo, stepTarget);
00441 
00442     switch( wo ) {
00443     case X_SMALLER:
00444     case X_BIGGER:
00445         step.x = (-step.x);
00446       angle = 180 - angle;
00447       break;
00448 
00449     case Y_SMALLER:
00450     case Y_BIGGER:
00451         step.y = (-step.y);
00452       angle = -angle;
00453       break;
00454 
00455     case Z_SMALLER:
00456     case Z_BIGGER:
00457         step.z = (-step.z);
00458       angle = -angle;
00459       break;
00460 
00461     case NOWHERE:
00462     default:
00463       error("wrong border handling case!");
00464       break;
00465     }
00466 }
00467 
00468 void BaseMobility::wrapIfOutside(BorderHandling wo,
00469                  Coord& stepTarget, Coord& targetPos) {
00470     switch( wo ) {
00471     case X_SMALLER:
00472     case X_BIGGER:
00473         targetPos.x = (FWMath::modulo(targetPos.x, playgroundSizeX()));
00474         stepTarget.x = (FWMath::modulo(stepTarget.x, playgroundSizeX()));
00475       break;
00476 
00477     case Y_SMALLER:
00478     case Y_BIGGER:
00479         targetPos.y = (FWMath::modulo(targetPos.y, playgroundSizeY()));
00480         stepTarget.y = (FWMath::modulo(stepTarget.y, playgroundSizeY()));
00481       break;
00482 
00483     case Z_SMALLER:
00484     case Z_BIGGER:
00485         targetPos.z = (FWMath::modulo(targetPos.z, playgroundSizeZ()));
00486         stepTarget.z = (FWMath::modulo(stepTarget.z, playgroundSizeZ()));
00487       break;
00488 
00489     case NOWHERE:
00490     default:
00491       error("wrong border handling case!");
00492       break;
00493     }
00494 }
00495 
00496 void BaseMobility::placeRandomlyIfOutside( Coord& targetPos )
00497 {
00498   targetPos = getRandomPosition();
00499 }
00500 
00501 BaseMobility::BorderHandling BaseMobility::checkIfOutside( Coord targetPos,
00502                                Coord& borderStep )
00503 {
00504     BorderHandling outside = NOWHERE;
00505 
00506     // Testing x-value
00507     if (targetPos.x < 0){
00508     borderStep.x = (-move.getStartPos().x);
00509     outside = X_SMALLER;
00510     }
00511     else if (targetPos.x >= playgroundSizeX()){
00512         borderStep.x = (playgroundSizeX() - move.getStartPos().x);
00513         outside = X_BIGGER;
00514     }
00515 
00516     // Testing y-value
00517     if (targetPos.y < 0){
00518       borderStep.y = (-move.getStartPos().y);
00519 
00520     if( outside == NOWHERE
00521       || fabs(borderStep.x/move.getDirection().x)
00522          > fabs(borderStep.y/move.getDirection().y) )
00523     {
00524       outside = Y_SMALLER;
00525     }
00526     }
00527     else if (targetPos.y >= playgroundSizeY()){
00528         borderStep.y = (playgroundSizeY() - move.getStartPos().y);
00529 
00530     if( outside == NOWHERE
00531       || fabs(borderStep.x/move.getDirection().x)
00532          > fabs(borderStep.y/move.getDirection().y) )
00533     {
00534       outside = Y_BIGGER;
00535     }
00536     }
00537 
00538     // Testing z-value
00539     if (!world->use2D())
00540     {
00541       // going to reach the lower z-border
00542       if (targetPos.z < 0)
00543       {
00544         borderStep.z = (-move.getStartPos().z);
00545 
00546         // no border reached so far
00547         if( outside==NOWHERE )
00548         {
00549           outside = Z_SMALLER;
00550         }
00551         // an y-border is reached earliest so far, test whether z-border
00552         // is reached even earlier
00553         else if( (outside == Y_SMALLER || outside == Y_BIGGER)
00554              && fabs(borderStep.y/move.getDirection().y)
00555                 > fabs(borderStep.z/move.getDirection().z) )
00556         {
00557           outside = Z_SMALLER;
00558         }
00559         // an x-border is reached earliest so far, test whether z-border
00560         // is reached even earlier
00561         else if( (outside == X_SMALLER || outside == X_BIGGER)
00562              && fabs(borderStep.x/move.getDirection().x)
00563                 > fabs(borderStep.z/move.getDirection().z) )
00564         {
00565           outside = Z_SMALLER;
00566         }
00567 
00568       }
00569       // going to reach the upper z-border
00570       else if (targetPos.z >= playgroundSizeZ())
00571       {
00572           borderStep.z = (playgroundSizeZ() - move.getStartPos().z);
00573 
00574           // no border reached so far
00575           if( outside==NOWHERE )
00576           {
00577             outside = Z_BIGGER;
00578           }
00579           // an y-border is reached earliest so far, test whether z-border
00580           // is reached even earlier
00581           else if( (outside==Y_SMALLER || outside==Y_BIGGER)
00582                && fabs(borderStep.y/move.getDirection().y)
00583                   > fabs(borderStep.z/move.getDirection().z) )
00584         {
00585           outside = Z_BIGGER;
00586         }
00587           // an x-border is reached earliest so far, test whether z-border
00588           // is reached even earlier
00589         else if( (outside==X_SMALLER || outside==X_BIGGER)
00590               && fabs(borderStep.x/move.getDirection().x)
00591                  > fabs(borderStep.z/move.getDirection().z) )
00592         {
00593           outside = Z_BIGGER;
00594         }
00595 
00596 
00597       }
00598     }
00599 
00600     coreEV << "checkIfOutside, outside="<<outside<<" borderStep: " << borderStep.info() << endl;
00601 
00602     return outside;
00603 }
00604 
00605 void BaseMobility::goToBorder(BorderPolicy policy, BorderHandling wo,
00606                 Coord& borderStep, Coord& borderStart)
00607 {
00608     double factor;
00609 
00610     coreEV << "goToBorder: startPos: " << move.getStartPos().info()
00611          << " borderStep: " << borderStep.info()
00612          << " BorderPolicy: " << policy
00613          << " BorderHandling: " << wo << endl;
00614 
00615     switch( wo ) {
00616     case X_SMALLER:
00617     factor = borderStep.x / move.getDirection().x;
00618     borderStep.y = (factor * move.getDirection().y);
00619     if (!world->use2D())
00620     {
00621       borderStep.z = (factor * move.getDirection().z); // 3D case
00622     }
00623 
00624     if( policy == WRAP )
00625     {
00626       borderStart.x = (playgroundSizeX());
00627       borderStart.y = (move.getStartPos().y + borderStep.y);
00628       if (!world->use2D())
00629       {
00630         borderStart.z = (move.getStartPos().z
00631                  + borderStep.z); // 3D case
00632       }
00633     }
00634     break;
00635 
00636     case X_BIGGER:
00637     factor = borderStep.x / move.getDirection().x;
00638     borderStep.y = (factor * move.getDirection().y);
00639     if (!world->use2D())
00640     {
00641       borderStep.z = (factor * move.getDirection().z); // 3D case
00642     }
00643 
00644     if( policy == WRAP )
00645     {
00646       borderStart.x = (0);
00647       borderStart.y = (move.getStartPos().y + borderStep.y);
00648       if (!world->use2D())
00649       {
00650         borderStart.z = (move.getStartPos().z
00651                  + borderStep.z); // 3D case
00652       }
00653     }
00654     break;
00655 
00656     case Y_SMALLER:
00657     factor = borderStep.y / move.getDirection().y;
00658     borderStep.x = (factor * move.getDirection().x);
00659     if (!world->use2D())
00660     {
00661       borderStep.z = (factor * move.getDirection().z); // 3D case
00662     }
00663 
00664     if( policy == WRAP )
00665     {
00666       borderStart.y = (playgroundSizeY());
00667       borderStart.x = (move.getStartPos().x + borderStep.x);
00668       if (!world->use2D())
00669       {
00670         borderStart.z = (move.getStartPos().z
00671                  + borderStep.z); // 3D case
00672       }
00673     }
00674     break;
00675 
00676     case Y_BIGGER:
00677     factor = borderStep.y / move.getDirection().y;
00678     borderStep.x = (factor * move.getDirection().x);
00679     if (!world->use2D())
00680     {
00681       borderStep.z = (factor * move.getDirection().z); // 3D case
00682     }
00683 
00684     if( policy == WRAP )
00685     {
00686       borderStart.y = (0);
00687       borderStart.x = (move.getStartPos().x + borderStep.x);
00688       if (!world->use2D())
00689       {
00690         borderStart.z = (move.getStartPos().z
00691                  + borderStep.z); // 3D case
00692       }
00693     }
00694     break;
00695 
00696     case Z_SMALLER: // here we are definitely in 3D
00697     factor = borderStep.z / move.getDirection().z;
00698     borderStep.x = (factor * move.getDirection().x);
00699     borderStep.y = (factor * move.getDirection().y);
00700 
00701     if( policy == WRAP )
00702     {
00703       borderStart.z = (playgroundSizeZ());
00704       borderStart.x = (move.getStartPos().x + borderStep.x);
00705       borderStart.y = (move.getStartPos().y + borderStep.y);
00706     }
00707     break;
00708 
00709     case Z_BIGGER: // here we are definitely in 3D
00710     factor = borderStep.z / move.getDirection().z;
00711     borderStep.x = (factor * move.getDirection().x);
00712     borderStep.y = (factor * move.getDirection().y);
00713 
00714     if( policy == WRAP )
00715     {
00716       borderStart.z = (0);
00717       borderStart.x = (move.getStartPos().x + borderStep.x);
00718       borderStart.y = (move.getStartPos().y + borderStep.y);
00719     }
00720     break;
00721 
00722     default:
00723         factor = 0;
00724         error("invalid state in goToBorder switch!");
00725         break;
00726     }
00727 
00728     coreEV << "goToBorder: startPos: " << move.getStartPos().info()
00729          << " borderStep: " << borderStep.info()
00730          << " borderStart: " << borderStart.info()
00731          << " factor: " << factor << endl;
00732 }
00733 
00734 bool BaseMobility::handleIfOutside(BorderPolicy policy, Coord& stepTarget,
00735                    Coord& targetPos, Coord& step,
00736                    double& angle)
00737 {
00738     // where did the host leave the playground?
00739     BorderHandling wo;
00740 
00741     // step to reach the border
00742     Coord borderStep;
00743 
00744     wo = checkIfOutside(stepTarget, borderStep);
00745 
00746     // just return if the next step is not outside the playground
00747     if( wo == NOWHERE )
00748   return false;
00749 
00750     coreEV << "handleIfOutside:stepTarget = " << stepTarget.info() << endl;
00751 
00752     // new start position after the host reaches the border
00753     Coord borderStart;
00754     // new direction the host has to move to
00755     Coord borderDirection;
00756     // time to reach the border
00757     simtime_t borderInterval;
00758 
00759     coreEV << "old values: stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info()
00760          << " step: " << step.info()
00761          << " targetPos: " << targetPos.info()
00762          << " angle: " << angle << endl;
00763 
00764     // which border policy is to be followed
00765     switch (policy){
00766     case REFLECT:
00767     reflectIfOutside( wo, stepTarget, targetPos, step, angle );
00768     break;
00769     case WRAP:
00770     wrapIfOutside( wo, stepTarget, targetPos );
00771     break;
00772     case PLACERANDOMLY:
00773     placeRandomlyIfOutside( targetPos );
00774     break;
00775     case RAISEERROR:
00776       break;
00777     }
00778 
00779     coreEV << "new values: stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info()
00780          << " step: " << step.info()
00781          << " angle: " << angle << endl;
00782 
00783     // calculate the step to reach the border
00784     goToBorder(policy, wo, borderStep, borderStart);
00785 
00786     // calculate the time to reach the border
00787     borderInterval = (borderStep.length()) / move.getSpeed();
00788 
00789     // calculate new start position
00790     // NOTE: for WRAP this is done in goToBorder
00791     switch( policy ){
00792     case REFLECT:
00793     {
00794       borderStart = move.getStartPos() + borderStep;
00795       double d = stepTarget.distance( borderStart );
00796     borderDirection = (stepTarget - borderStart) / d;
00797     break;
00798     }
00799     case PLACERANDOMLY:
00800     borderStart = targetPos;
00801     stepTarget = targetPos;
00802     break;
00803 
00804     case WRAP:
00805     case RAISEERROR:
00806       break;
00807 
00808     default:
00809       error("unknown BorderPolicy");
00810       break;
00811     }
00812 
00813     coreEV << "border handled, borderStep: "<< borderStep.info()
00814          << "borderStart: " << borderStart.info()
00815          << " stepTarget " << stepTarget.info() << endl;
00816 
00817     // create a border self message and schedule it appropriately
00818     BorderMsg *bMsg = new BorderMsg("borderMove", MOVE_TO_BORDER);
00819     bMsg->setPolicy(policy);
00820     bMsg->setStartPos(borderStart);
00821     bMsg->setDirection(borderDirection);
00822 
00823     scheduleAt(simTime() + borderInterval, bMsg);
00824 
00825     return true;
00826 }
